name: NWProtocolTCP.Options
desc: A container of options for configuring how TCP is used on a connection.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a default set of TCP connection options.

items.name: var enableFastOpen: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that enables TCP Fast Open on a connection.

items.name: var maximumSegmentSize: Int
items.desc: TCP's maximum segment size in bytes.

items.name: var noDelay: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that disables Nagle's algorithm for TCP.

items.name: var noOptions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that sets TCP into no-options mode.

items.name: var noPush: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that sets TCP into no-push mode.

items.name: var retransmitFinDrop: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that causes TCP to drop its connection after not receiving an ACK packet after a FIN packet.

items.name: var disableAckStretching: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that disables TCP acknowledgment stretching.

items.name: var disableECN: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that disables negotiation of Explicit Congestion Notification markings.

items.name: var enableKeepalive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that enables TCP keepalives.

items.name: var keepaliveIdle: Int
items.desc: The number of seconds of idleness that TCP waits before sending keepalive probes.

items.name: var keepaliveCount: Int
items.desc: The number of keepalive probes that TCP sends before terminating the connection.

items.name: var keepaliveInterval: Int
items.desc: The number of seconds that TCP waits between sending keepalive probes.

items.name: var connectionTimeout: Int
items.desc: The number of seconds that TCP waits before timing out its handshake.

items.name: var connectionDropTime: Int
items.desc: The timeout, in seconds, for TCP retransmission attempts.

items.name: var persistTimeout: Int
items.desc: The TCP persist timeout, in seconds, as defined by RFC 6429.
